## API

### astralRegex([options])

Returns a `RegExp` for matching astral symbols.

#### options

Type: `Object`

##### exact

Type: `boolean`<br>
Default: `false` *(Matches any astral symbols in a string)*

Only match an exact string. Useful with `RegExp#test()` to check if a string is a astral symbol.
